text: Michelle welcome to the BBC let me begin
with when you were taken and what can
you tell us about what actually happened
then well I was walking to appointment
for my son and I didn't know exactly
where it was so I asked for help
and when I did ask for hope the first
person didn't know where it was but the
second person that came through the door
knew where it was and it happened to be
my friend's father so I was comfortable
enough to get in his car and he was
talking about like different types of
things like his motorcycle he was
talking about puppies and I was like oh
so you got puppies at the house and he
was like yeah and I was like okay I
could take one home to my son and then
he was like okay so we drive to his
house and he goes in to get it at first
you know I didn't think nothing of it
him him lacking the gate it's a bad
neighborhood so I continued to keep
going and then when we got in the house
it was kind of awkward I didn't hear
puppies I didn't hear no sounds so I
started to get a little nervous and then
I got even more nervous as we were going
up the stairs next thing you know we're
in a room and I never got out never good
night no where did he then take you how
did he actually physically make sure
that you didn't get out presumably lots
of locks on the doors where you tied up
after we got into the room he told me
that he was only gonna keep me there for
a little while and then he sat there and
took my hands and my legs that was after
I already dropped to the floor of crying
and numbness because my whole body just
dropped
I couldn't I couldn't function I
couldn't do anything after that I was in
foam full-blown I think shock and my
body just dropped to the floor crying
please let me go I need to get to my son
and that's when he decided to get some
extension cord and wrap it around my
legs and he also got duct tape to put
her on my mouth what happened over the
next few days they like the next few
days were pure torture he proceeded to
have sex with me he hit me
quite frequently he always sat there and
told me that if I tried anything or try
the scape he'll kill me did you think
people were looking for you that the
fact that you had gone would have been
noticed no I didn't think anybody was
looking for me because when I was at
home nobody really looked for me at all
because there was a point of time when I
ran away from my mother and she didn't
look then and Castro Ariel Castro told
you that nobody would ever look for you
nobody cared this is the phrase that he
used if I were to kill you today nobody
would look for you tomorrow
he told you that over and over yes
in your heart did you believe one day I
think one day but I didn't believe it
was gonna be as soon as possible I knew
it was gonna be a long time before I
actually got out of there things changed
when he abducted other women Gina how
did how did things change when they
arrived when they arrived he was a lot
different he fed the other two girls and
I was the one that didn't get fed he
didn't think that I deserved it
were you defiant or was there just no
point I was hard-headed so yeah most of
the time identify what he said and how
he said it like I will always sit there
and say well you can feed the other
girls but you can't feed me that's not
right
and he'll get so angry and so frustrated
that he'll end up hitting me reading
your book and in our conversation you've
never once used his name have you never
you can't bear to say it or what it's
just it's just a healing mechanism that
I used inside the house like he was a
nameless face don't name something that
is unpure how did it happen how did you
finally get your freedom tell us the
story
it was quite interesting that day was
quite weird
we had an eerie feeling like something
was going to happen and next thing you
know I hear pounding I hear commotion
downstairs don't know what it is I
thought it was somebody breaking in and
then next thing you know we hear police
but me being my instincts you can always
think that's anybody can say it anybody
can say please please and so I reached
for the door and as I'm reaching for the
door I have this eerie feeling like
don't open it yet don't open it you
don't know what's behind that door so I
slowly go to open it and as I open it a
couple times I noticed like certain
things that led me to believe that it
was an actual cop so the last time I
opened I just ran into the woman's arms
and literally choked her and told her
not to let me go don't let me go and all
that happened because Amanda got out yes
and alerted the authorities and they
came to the house got you all out tell

was in a way reliving some of this
horrible stuff that you've gone through
the trail for me was like a healing

because you turned out to make a victim
in impact statement that he told the

it was that a really big moment for you
that was that was a tremendous moment
for me because I didn't know I can
actually say his name I didn't really
want to say it but I said it anyway
because at first I was just gonna say
dude so I was like no I got a direct him
this has to be the moment that I take
where I sit there and say what he has
done to me don't define who I am when he
killed himself in prison committed
suicide I just wanted what you thought
of that I thought I was a senseless act
I thought he was an act of cowardice
I thought his children didn't deserve
what he they he put them through because
they didn't need to be heard a second
time you know it's interesting listening

somehow you found to keep going four

do you ever think of him that um no I
really don't I tried to put the past

so what what are you doing that I am
